summary: I HAVE THE 06 PATHFINDER, THERE WAS A RECALL THAT I WAS NOT AWARE OF, UNTIL I START SEARCHING AFTER THE CAR HAVE ACCELERATING ISSUE THAT ALMOST CAUSE AN ACCIDENT MULTIPLE OCCASIONS, ANYWAY I WENT TO MY DEALERSHIP AND THEY SAID NISSAN ONLY COVER U TO 100000 MILES. OUR IS 15000 MILES OVER, THE PROBLEM WAS A DEFECTED RADIATOR AND THAT LEAK COOLANT INTO THE TRANSMISSION. IT WOULD COST US $7600 TO REPAIR IT , AND WAY OVER OUR BUDGET . I START CHECK ONLINE AND THERE IS A LOT OF COMPLAINTS ON THIS ISSUES. HOPE MY COMPLAINTS HELP US AND MANY OTHERS THAT HELP SAME MISFORTUNE.  *TR
